text: but what spoke to me was the way it went with the dress
and also I love feathers, and it had feathers on it. And
it has this little head band that makes it stay on, so I can
wiggle all day long, and it doesn't fall off! *laughs*
It's not uncomfortable. It's light, and it's very comfortable.
My husband has been around the horse industry for
a very long time, and so we are big horseracing fans.
So of course for Derby and Oaks, you always have a hat
and at 30, you can move things around on them
put more feathers, take feathers off, put flowers,
put ribbons. So some of them have been altered
since I bought them to go with what I'm wearing.
But I think this one's going to stay completely
like it is. It's just- it's so perfect, and
I may wear it every year for the rest of my life. *laughs*
